Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MAS 3106 and either MAD 4203 or MAD 4301, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Advanced topics in discrete mathematics. Selection of topics will vary.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Either MHF 3302 or COT 3100C, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Graph theory; isomorphism, connectivity; traversability, matchings, factorizations; planarity, colorings, and Ramsey number.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: 2 years of high school algebra and 1 year of geometry or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Basic mathematical logic, methods of proof in mathematics, and application to elementary discrete structure.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MAC 2312, and either MHF 3302 or COT 3100C, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Counting principles; permutations and combinations, multisets; recurrence relations and generating functions; combinatorial designs; the Polya theory of counting.
